movies.title: When the Woman Butts In
movies.plot: The study of Dr Frantisek Prucha, who bears the nickname Faust, is located in Faust's House, now converted into a hospital. Dr Prucha is worn out from overwork, thus he does not even notice the interest he is generating among the women around him. One of them unexpectedly appears at one of his lectures. In her red dress she looks like Mephistopheles dressed as a woman and Faust privately calls her Mephistopheles. After he returns home, under strange circumstances, he finds her in his room and he begins to think he is suffering from hallucinations.
movies.simplePlot: The study of Dr Frantisek Prucha, who bears the nickname Faust, is located in Faust's House, now converted into a hospital. Dr Prucha is worn out from overwork, thus he does not even notice...

biography.placeOfBirth: Pilsen, Bohemia, Austria-Hungary [now Plzen, Czech Republic]
biography.bio: Miroslav Hornícek was born on November 10, 1918 in Pilsen, Bohemia, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor and writer, known for Vera - nevera (1972), When the Woman Butts In (1960) and Byli jednou dva písari (1972). He died on February 15, 2003 in Prague, Czech Republic.
biography.name: Miroslav Hornícek

biography.bio: Jana Hlavácová was born on March 26, 1938 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. She is an actress, known for The Dance Teacher (1995), Viditelny svet (2011) and When the Woman Butts In (1960). She is married to Ludek Munzar. They have one child. She was previously married to Jirí Michný.
biography.name: Jana Hlavácová

biography.bio: Vlastimil Brodský was born on December 15, 1920 in Hrusov, Ostrava, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor and writer, known for Closely Watched Trains (1966), Autumn Spring (2001) and Jacob the Liar (1974). He was married to Jana Brejchová and Bozena Brodská. He died on April 20, 2002 in Slunecna, Czech Republic.
biography.name: Vlastimil Brodský

biography.bio: Jirí Sovák was born on December 27, 1920 in Prague, Czechoslovakia as Jirí Schmitzer. He was an actor and writer, known for Kolya (1996), Marecku, Pass Me the Pen! (1976) and Who Wants to Kill Jessie? (1966). He died on September 6, 2000 in Prague, Czech Republic.
biography.name: Jirí Sovák

biography.bio: Rudolf Hrusínský was born on October 17, 1920 in Nová Vcelnice, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor and director, known for L'incinérateur de cadavres (1969), Alouettes, le fil à la patte (1990) and Capricious Summer (1968). He died on April 13, 1994 in Prague, Czech Republic.
biography.name: Rudolf Hrusínský

biography.bio: Bohumil Bezouska was born on December 19, 1921 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for Smutný puvab (1963), The Emperor and the Golem (1952) and Pan Vetrovský z Vetrova a paní Destná z Destova (1969). He died on October 18, 1995 in Prague, Czech Republic.
biography.name: Bohumil Bezouska

biography.bio: Vera Budilová is an actress, known for A nebojís se, princeznicko? (1980), O Emínce a Havlíckovi (1974) and Jak se sevcem sili certi (1975).
biography.name: Vera Budilová

biography.bio: Josef Bulík is known for his work on Le piège (Il faut tuer Sekal) (1998), Uloupená hranice (1947) and Sedmý kontinent (1960).
biography.name: Josef Bulík

biography.bio: Vítezslav Cerný was born on July 1, 1922 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for Soudce Stokroc (1967), Young Bohácek's Sufferings (1969) and The Sad Princess (1968). He died on August 4, 1986 in Prague.
biography.name: Vítezslav Cerný

biography.placeOfBirth: Mladá Boleslav, Bohemia, Austria-Hungary [now Czech Republic]
biography.bio: Darja Hajská was born on April 20, 1911 in Mladá Boleslav, Bohemia, Austria-Hungary as Darja Dea Vorísková. She was an actress, known for Kouríme domovinu (1944), Six Bears and a Clown (1972) and Já uz budu hodný, dedecku! (1979). She died on March 18, 1981 in Prague, Czechoslovakia.
biography.name: Darja Hajská

biography.bio: Ivan Helcl is an actor and production manager, known for Kaspar Hauser (1993), Utz, la passion de l'art (1992) and Motanice (1988).
biography.name: Ivan Helcl

biography.bio: Karel Hospodský is an actor, known for Orange Moon (1962), Your Money or Your Life (1932) and The Great Adventure (1952).
biography.name: Karel Hospodský

biography.bio: Otto Hradecký is an actor, known for Valérie au pays des merveilles (1970), I Dutifully Report (1958) and Bretislav a Jitka (1974).
biography.name: Otto Hradecký

biography.bio: Frantisek Miska was born on August 27, 1919 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor and director, known for Inzerát (1967), Konec cesty (1960) and Les hommes sans ailes (1946). He died on February 11, 2017 in Prague, Czech Republic.
biography.name: Frantisek Miska

biography.bio: Nina Popelíková was born on October 14, 1920 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. She was an actress, known for Certova nevesta (1975), The Apple Game (1977) and Hospital at the End of the City (1977). She was married to Ota Sklencka. She died on April 18, 1982 in Prague.
biography.name: Nina Popelíková
